description:
Cooking Tycoons 3 - 3 in 1 Bundle

Showcase variety in your cooking skills by mastering three different kinds of cuisine thanks to these three games bundled together:

Sweet Bakery Tycoon
Pancake Bar Tycoon
Salad Bar Tycoon

and all expansion packs available included! Featuring:

Over 310 levels equal to dozens of hours of fun!
10 unique locations with plenty of variety 
150+ achievements to ramp up the challenge
170 different dishes to serve
Countless unlockable items to upgrade your equipment, interior and ingredients

Give it a try and check if you can become the best chef in the city.
name: Cooking Tycoons 3: 3 in 1 Bundle
intro: The next installment in the great Cooking Tycoons series is here!
